import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { FaSuitcaseRolling, FaWeightHanging, FaPlusCircle, FaRegQuestionCircle } from 'react-icons/fa'; const BaggagePolicy = () => { return (
{/* Back Button */}

Baggage Policy

To ensure a smooth and comfortable journey, here's everything you need to know about our baggage rules.

What’s Included?

Each passenger is allowed 1 cabin bag and 1 personal item — at no additional cost!

Cabin Bag Size

Your cabin bag should not exceed 8kg, with dimensions up to 55x40x20 cm. Personal items, like a purse or laptop bag, are welcome as well!

Need More Space?

Don’t worry! You can add extra baggage while booking or later through your account dashboard.

Have More Questions?

Visit our Help Center for additional information and frequently asked questions.

{/* Quick Links - Buttons */}
{/* Increased space between buttons */}
); }; export default BaggagePolicy;
